938950.name: Super Seducer 2 - Soundtrack
938950.description:
All of your favorite Super Seducer 2 classic jams, here for your listening pleasure. In uncompressed .wav format!!!

Tracklist:
  • Slam Sounds - Proud (Deep Shoq Remix)
  • Deep Shoq - Breathe (2018 edit)
  • Deep Shoq - Endlessness
  • Deep Shoq - Fool Without You
  • Deep Shoq - Let's Run Away, Let's Escape (2018 Edit)
  • Deep Shoq - Make Dis Choize
  • Deep Shoq - Owe You One
  • Deep Shoq - Patience
  • Deep Shoq - Perpetuum (2018 edit)
  • Deep Shoq - Phantom
  • Deep Shoq - Redemption
  • Deep Shoq - Smash It Slap Bang
  • Deep Shoq - Thru Hassles (2018 edit)
  • Deep Shoq & Kotryna - Canvas
  • Deep Shoq & Kotryna - Hidden
